text: The Optare Vecta was a single-deck bus body of a bus. It had a step entrance. It was made from 1991 to 1997 by Optare. The Vecta body could be built on the MAN 11.190 chassis. The front of the Vecta was used on Optare's Spectra double-decker bus. ==References== ==Other websites== Vecta Category:Step- entrance buses
title: Optare Vecta
